Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ DrawLabelsTy

enum XPMP2RCGlobals::DrawLabelsTy

Shall aircraft labels be drawn at remote site?

Enumerator
LABELS_SYNCH 

Synchronize drawing of labels with sending client.

LABELS_ON 

Always draw labels.

LABELS_OFF 

Don't draw labels.
